channel.title: Need help running a 718 server with Linux
channel.description:
Windows works fine and runs just great
however I want to convert over to Linux (Ubuntu)
I tried getting the run server to run but... No luck...
I only had somewhat luck running it in wine but it wouldn't load anything that had to do with java...
So... my question is how can i get this working with Linux?
Here are my run.sh files
[code] @echo off title Server echo Launching Server... #!/bin/bash cd /host/Users/Dillon/Downloads/Bens Project/Ben's Project/Ben's Project/ "/home/dillon/jdk1.7.0_13/bin/java" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true true read [/code]

item.title: Need help running a 718 server with Linux
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Windows works fine and runs just great

however I want to convert over to Linux (Ubuntu)

I tried getting the run server to run but… No luck…

I only had somewhat luck running it in wine but it wouldn’t load anything that had to do with java…

So… my question is how can i get this working with Linux?

Here are my run.sh files

@echo off
title Server
echo Launching Server...
#!/bin/bash
cd /host/Users/Dillon/Downloads/Bens Project/Ben's Project/Ben's Project/
"/home/dillon/jdk1.7.0_13/bin/java" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true true
read

Read full topic
item.source: Need help running a 718 server with Linux
